thread.title: Frankly speaking, 'Rizzo' is a most challenging role

title: Frankly speaking, 'Rizzo' is a most challenging role
text:
Published By: Philly Performing Arts - Today 
Acclaimed local actor Scott Greer tackles what may be his most challenging role ever: That of former Philly Mayor Frank Rizzo....
